survey_name: Sustainability Practices in Coffee Shops Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on sustainability practices implemented by coffee shops, including waste reduction, sourcing, and energy efficiency.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit coffee shops?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This helps segment frequent vs. occasional visitors.
